channel.title: Iforeverscape~~~718~~~ beta
channel.description:
Webclient: [url=http://iforeverscape.webstarts.com/index.html]http://iforeverscape.webstarts.com/index.html[/url]
Forums: http://iforeverscape.comuv.com/index.php
Updates: To see current updates, please visit the forums.
Server is spawn until we are ready to leave beta, however, you still need to train your skills. Enjoy it while it lasts!
Use ;;item (id) (amt) - [url=http://itemdb.biz/index.php]http://itemdb.biz/index.php[/url]
Remember, this is a public beta, meaning, it is to better the server and take suggestions from players to enhance gameplay. I hope you enjoy the game!
~ Features ~
24/7 Uptime Near perfect ecnomoy - (still under construction) Monster's + NPC's spread out all over the map! Fun PK-ing Constant updates Active owner No donating/PK-ing rewards - (this levels the playing field for new players) Not too slow, not too fast XP rates.
~ Media ~ [img]http://i703.photobucket.com/albums/ww34/arrowdynamic/a5clj7.png[/img]

thx

item.title: Iforeverscape~~~718~~~ beta
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

doctornkiller:

thanks and if u have any other suggestions plz tell us

I think it’s pretty nice right now, do you have global NPCs? As in NPCs placed all around the world? People like to adventure. Also have some type of global drop system as well if you don’t already.

Read full topic

item.title: Iforeverscape~~~718~~~ beta
item.dc:creator: @doctornkiller doctornkiller
item.description:
@doctornkiller wrote:

i fixed the picturers thank you for telling me,
as for why we stand out is because we have constant updates to make the game better and take suggestions, we are in beta stage so that is also why we look the same as any other server if you have a suggestion then please tell me thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Iforeverscape~~~718~~~ beta

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

what makes this server better than others on here? You haven’t shown us any unique images

Read full topic

item.title: Iforeverscape~~~718~~~ beta
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

Try cropping or half-sizing your images, they are kinda big and on some resolutions you can’t see them fully. Also they take a while to load. Other than that it looks decent I guess. How do you plan on getting donors without rewards?

Read full topic

item.title: Iforeverscape~~~718~~~ beta
item.dc:creator: @doctornkiller doctornkiller
item.description:
@doctornkiller wrote:

Webclient: http://iforeverscape.webstarts.com/index.html

Forums: http://iforeverscape.comuv.com/index.php

Updates: To see current updates, please visit the forums.

Server is spawn until we are ready to leave beta, however, you still need to train your skills. Enjoy it while it lasts!

Use ;;item (id) (amt) - http://itemdb.biz/index.php

Remember, this is a public beta, meaning, it is to better the server and take suggestions from players to enhance gameplay. I hope you enjoy the game!

~ Features ~

24/7 Uptime
Near perfect ecnomoy - (still under construction)
Monster’s + NPC’s spread out all over the map!
Fun PK-ing
Constant updates
Active owner
No donating/PK-ing rewards - (this levels the playing field for new players)
Not too slow, not too fast XP rates.
